name: Thunderbeast's Targe
description:
After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Electro DMG.
When your character receives at least 3 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Deal 1 $[K104].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character receives at least 3 DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 1.\n$[K4]: 2
